maneuver.instruction: Enter the roundabout and take the 1st exit onto University Road West.
Make a right U-turn at Irwell Place to stay on A6/Crescent.
Keep right to stay on A6.
You have arrived at your destination.
Drive west on A576/Pendleton Roundabout. Continue on A576.
Enter the roundabout and take the 4th exit onto Gerald Road.
Exit the roundabout onto Gerald Road.
You have arrived at your destination.
